properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 10 at 3:08PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 45 kt and highest waves around 15
feet expected.

* WHERE...Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder
Bay National Marine Sanctuary and Sturgeon Pt to Alabaster MI.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous highest waves
which could capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
